Comment: About a third of our neighbors  are idiot, sociopathic sadists who are vicariously reveling in the pain and trauma Trump is inflicting on marginalized groups.     They will never abandon their bully god because they derive too much sadistic gratification from his Nazi horror show.   So that is the floor for Trump, the sociopathic third.   Where we go from here is increasing the intensity of contempt for Trump from the sane center. Right now about 44% strongly dislike the direction the country is headed in. This is where there is a lot of room for growth and where that growth will really matter.   A majority of Americans strongly opposed to Trump will break him by sharply undermining his support within the GOP.  And there is every reason to think that tariffs are about cause the kind of economic calamity that can galvanize the center against Trump.   But we can not sit on our hands and cheer economic  calamity along.   We all need to do our part by protesting and making noise to help the opposition blossom.
Author: Beantown-Jack
